CommandTranslatorRule:
This rule catches calls to the "Draw" command, that burns current ROI or writing to the image. It applies to a given ImageProcessor.
# Get current ImagePlus image = WindowManager.getCurrentImage() # Get the current ROI roi = image.getRoi() # Get current ImageProcessor (i.e. the current displayed slice) ip = image.getProcessor() # Draw ROI with foreground color if roi is not None: ip.draw(roi) # Refresh display image.updateAndDraw()
